The Worldwide Brands
Directory of Certified Wholesalers
Wholesale Scam Protection

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ theme_builder_area=”post_content” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”-33px||||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″ da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” type=”4_4″ theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_divider _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” theme_builder_area=”post_content” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Largest Directory Block” _builder_version=”4.26.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”-66px|||||” custom_padding=”0px|||||” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Largest Directory Header” _builder_version=”4.26.1″ _module_preset=”default” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.26.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Largest Directory Header” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”22px” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#0C71C3″ header_2_font_size=”30px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Wholesale Scams Can be Devastating

Don’t Put Your Customers & Your Reputation At Risk.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Globe and Text” _builder_version=”4.26.1″ _module_preset=”default” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.26.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://worldwidebrands.com/nws/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/scamwholesalers-what-happens_scamprotection.jpg” alt=”with scam protection you can avoid fake wholesalers” title_text=”scamwholesalers what happens_scamprotection” admin_label=”Globe Boxes” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”-95px||-42px|-136px|false|false” custom_padding=”74px|||||” animation_direction=”right” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.26.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”16 Million Text” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”18px” header_font_size=”50px” custom_padding=”32px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Fake Suppliers
Hurt Your Customers

When new sellers are looking for “dropshippers”, “suppliers” or “wholesalers” online they often don’t think about the problems that can occur if you accidentally start working with a Scam Supplier.

Keep in mind, when you setup an account with Middlemen and Fake Wholesalers you are giving them not only YOUR information but some of your customers personal contact information as well!

Fake suppliers can do any number of things with the information you provide them about yourself or your customers. From email phishing scams to identity theft to fake credit card charges. If you unwittingly setup an account with a fake supplier you are putting yourself and your customers at great risk!

     

    [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Globe and Text” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.26.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”18px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

    Wholesale Scams
    Hurt Your Business

    When you start an online business you should expect to pay some startup costs. However, many new sellers are fooled into thinking that paying money to their Supplier is just part of “starting an online store”…and it’s not!

    A common scam with fake suppliers is to charge ‘setup fees’, monthly fees, annual fees and all kinds of other fees to new sellers who just don’t know any better. You may think you’re getting a good deal when in fact you are setting your business up for certain failure.

    Fake suppliers and middlemen often charge all of those fees because they know you won’t be making any sales. With their inflated wholesale prices and often false selection of products they know the only way they are getting any money from you is up front. So they just keep on charging fees until you get tired of it and leave.

    [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://worldwidebrands.com/nws/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/wholesale-scams-scam-protection.jpg” alt=”wholesale scam protection protects from extra fees” title_text=”wholesale-scams-scam-protection” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”59px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_divider _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Largest Directory Header” _builder_version=”4.26.1″ _module_preset=”default” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.26.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Largest Directory Header” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”22px” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#0C71C3″ header_2_font_size=”30px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

    The SAFEST Wholesaler Directory Online 

    100% Certified Suppliers. Factory-Authorized.

    [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://worldwidebrands.com/nws/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/scamprotection_directory-desktop.png” alt=”image shows the directory has build in scam protection” title_text=”scamprotection_directory-desktop” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” width=”86%” custom_margin=”-54px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”18px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

    Keep Your Customers Safe
    …and Your Reputation Great!

    Since 1999 we have been the Industry Leaders in providing safe, trustworthy & reliable wholesale distributor information to Retailers. We take great pride in helping keep eCommerce safe with Certified Suppliers.

    As a Member of Worldwide Brands you never have to worry about wholesale scams, fake suppliers and middlemen with built in Wholesale Scam Protection. Keep your customers safe and start building a great reputation online! Grow your business with confidence in the knowledge that you are working directly with safe, secure factory-authorized Suppliers. Our WBI Certified Seal guarantees it.

    We are proud to offer the safest Wholesale Directory for both online sellers and physical retail stores! We make it our personal responsibility to ensure YOU are always working with nothing but the best Wholesale Suppliers.

    [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://worldwidebrands.com/nws/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/wholesale-scam-protection-shield.jpg” alt=”wholesale scam protection shield” title_text=”wholesale scam protection shield” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” width=”60%” custom_margin=”|||88px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”18px” custom_margin=”|||88px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

    No Markups. No Increases.
    100% Real Wholesale

    Wholesale Scam Protection™ is the security you
    get from working with our listed Wholesalers.
    When you work with a WBI Certified Supplier you
    get REAL wholesale prices from Factory-
    Authorized (Top Level) Wholesale Suppliers.
    Guaranteed.

    [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://worldwidebrands.com/nws/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/wholesale-scam-protection-noaddedfees.jpg” alt=”With wholesale scam protection there are no extra fees” title_text=”wholesale scam protection-noaddedfees” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” width=”66%” custom_margin=”|||88px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”18px” custom_margin=”-15px|||88px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

    No Monthly or Annual Fees.
    Free Account Setups

    Setting up FREE Wholesale Accounts with WBI
    Certified Wholesalers is fast, easy and FREE.
    Since we ONLY certify Factory-Authorized
    Suppliers you are protected against wholesale
    scams, monthly fees, annual fees, setup fees
    and other fake fees. That is our Wholesale Scam Protection guarantee.

    [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_url=”/wholesale-directory/” button_text=”How it Works” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_bg_color=”#E09900″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_radius=”20px” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_button][et_pb_button button_url=”/order-now/” button_text=”Get Started Now!” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_bg_color=”#E09900″ button_border_radius=”20px” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” button_alignment=”center” sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Testimonials Block” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#c6d9f2″ custom_padding=”||37px|||” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” box_shadow_style=”preset6″ box_shadow_spread=”6px” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.26.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.26.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Trust Pilot Review” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”28px|25px|28px|25px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#0C71C3″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

    Your Directory is Amazing

    I just want to say THANK YOU! Your directory is amazing. I purchased several other directories – before I was fortunate enough to stumble upon your site – and without exception, all of them have turned out to be scams. After reading through the information on your web site, I decided to purchase your product. Of course, having been misled several times, I was a little nervous. Not to worry. I was thrilled when I accessed the site for the first time. There was much smiling and squealing involved. I am extremely impressed; it is every bit as fabulous as you claim

    Kristin

    [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.26.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”28px|25px|28px|25px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#0C71C3″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

    You Have My Back
    I decided that I wanted a piece of the E Commerce Pie, after a month of looking on my own and searching for drop shippers that were legit and who wasn’t an arm and a leg to join (the individual fees add up quickly) ….I found Worldwide Brands. I took a chance, BEST thing I have ever done. No additional fees on top of Worldwide Brands one time fee, great mark ups and working with 6 different drop shippers. I feel like you have my back, even when I was having trouble locating a certain product I wanted to feature, your research staff helped me out (in 2 days) saving me the time and effort. THANKS AGAIN.

    Shelle

    [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.26.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”28px|25px|28px|25px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#0C71C3″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

    This is The Best

    I have tried everything else but this is the best. I like the qualified wholesalers list. Save a lot of time and time is money. Thanks Worldwide Brands for the work you have done to make people a success.

    Louis

    [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
